dmca.title: Apts Frauds
dmca.body:
I am the attorney for [Private]. My client
has directed my attention to the various web postings
you have made regarding their apartment complex and
your unlawful attacks on their business practices and
their employees' character.

It is one thing to exercise your right of free speech
in a lawful manner. However, when you cross the line
into harmful and actionable conduct that can negatively
impact my client's business, they have no other choice
but to pursue you and your web hosts in court to seek
an appropriate restraining order and to sue for money
damages. 

To avoid this legal action, you must immediately CEASE
and DESIST from disseminating all untrue statements
regarding my client or their employees, which includes
statements of which you do not have first hand
knowledge. You must remove all such postings currently
on the internet or anywhere else you have disseminated
them, by March 7, 2004.

If you fail to act by this deadline, a lawsuit will be
filed against you. My client has already provided your
identity to me.  

I sincerely hope you take this one opportunity to
diffuse this situation before expensive and
time-consuming litigation is commenced. You have had
your say and vented your frustration but now it is time
to stop your unlawful conduct.   

Sincerely,

[Private]
Attorney at Law
